original_text: But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged by you or by any human court. In fact, I do not even judge myself.
korean_text: 너희에게나 다른 사람에게나 판단 받는 것이 내게는 매우 작은 일이라 나도 나를 판단하지 아니하노니

sentences.original_text: But with me it is a very small thing
that I should be judged by you
In fact, I do not even judge myself.
sentences.korean_translation: 사실, 나는 나 자신조차 심판하지 않습니다
